gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `RightsGrantedNotYetExercised` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `RightsGrantedNotYetExercised` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovementByManagingDirectorSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovementByManagingDirectorSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovementByManagingDirectorSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovementByManagingDirectorSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovementByManagingDirectorSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovementByManagingDirectorSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan + `RightsGrantedDuringFinancialYear` - `RightsGrantedExercisedDuringFinancialYear`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovementByManagingDirectorSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1T1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovementByManagingDirectorSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1T1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovementByManagingDirectorSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1T1_RightsGrantedDuringFinancialYear')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovementByManagingDirectorSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1T1_RightsGrantedDuringFinancialYear return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovementByManagingDirectorSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1T1_RightsGrantedExercisedDuringFinancialYear')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovementByManagingDirectorSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1T1_RightsGrantedExercisedDuringFinancialYear return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
